Light and warmth from a forgotten power burns within you, revealing the hidden and flowing out to burn your foes.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Uncommon

Properties:

  • You gain low-light vision.
  • When you roll a saving throw against an ongoing damage effect that deals fire damage or radiant damage, roll twice and use either result.

Power âœ¦ Daily (No Action)

Trigger: You use an at-will attack power and hit at least one target.

Effect: Roll a d6 for each target you hit. On a 3 or higher, the target also takes ongoing 5 fire and radiant damage (save ends).

Level 19: Ongoing 10 fire and radiant damage (save ends).

Level 29: Ongoing 15 fire and radiant damage (save ends).
